name: Stargrail Dragon Imduk
desc:
Link Markers: Top

1 Normal Monster, except a Token
During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Stargrail" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster this card points to: You can destroy that opponent's monster. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Stargrail" monster from your hand.
